class BasicJSCache {
    constructor() {
        this.cache = {};
    }
 
    get(args, cb) {
        if (this.cache[args.key]) {
            if (IDate.now() > this.cache[args.key].expires) {
                delete this.cache[args.key];
                return cb('expired cache key', null);
            } else {
                return cb(null, this.cache[args.key].value);
            }
        }
        return cb("cache key doesn't exist", null);
    }
 
    set(args, value) {
        this.cache[args.key] = {
            expires: args.ttl ? this.setExp(Date.now(), args.ttl) : null,
            value: value,
        };
    }
 
    setExp(date, secs) {
        // Must convert to milliseconds.
        return date + secs * 1000;
    }
 
    flushCache(cb) {
        this.cache = {};
        // Promise/await compatibility.
        if (typeof cb === 'function') {
            cb(null, 'OK');
        }
    }
}
 
export default BasicJSCache;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Sun Dec 17 2017 00:22:31 GMT-0800 (PST)
